Class-Warlock 20 — Female Human Warlock: 20
Strength: 12 (1) Dexterity: 12 (1) Constitution: 14 (2) Intelligence: 18 (4) Wisdom: 12 (1) Charisma: 15 (2)
Background: Acolyte Alignment: Chaotic Neutral Deity: Greek-Hecate (CE)
Experience: 910388/1000000 Level: 20 Size: Medium Speed: 30 Carry/Lift: 180/360
Ability Notes:
Human Ability Adjustment: +1 Charisma/+1 Constitution/+1 Dexterity/+1 Intelligence/+1 Strength/+1 Wisdom
Elemental Gift: Can use a bonus action to gain a 30' fly Speed for 10 min 6 times per long rest
Gift Of The Sea: Has a 40' swim Speed and can breathe water
Features/Skills
Proficiency Bonus: 6
Feat Count: General: 5 Selectable Feature Count: Warlock (Eldritch Invocation): 8; Warlock (Genie Kind): 1; Warlock (Otherworldly Patron): 1; Warlock (Pact Boon): 1

Skill Notes:
Skilled: Skill Proficiency (Choose 3 from any)
Bulky Armor: Has disadvantage on Stealth
Oceanic Soul: While submerged, can understand and be understood by any speaking creature
Combat
Hit Points: 157 Initiative: 1 Armor Class: 12 Attacks Per Round: 1
Armor Proficiency: Light Weapon Proficiency: Simple Weapons
Armor: Padded Shield: None Weapons: Javelin (+7 1d6+1 R30/120); Quarterstaff (+7 1d8+1); Unarmed (+7 1+1)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +40
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +1
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +1
Dexterity Damage Adjustment: +1
Strength Attack Adjustment: +1
Strength Damage Adjustment: +1
Tough: +40 Hit Points
Genie's Vessel: Can inflict +6 HP cold once per rd and retreat into a vessel with armor class 16 and 26 hit points for 12 hr once per long rest
Great Weapon Master: Can use a bonus action to attack after scoring a critical hit or reducing a foe to 0 hit points with a melee weapon/Can make a -5 attack with a heavy weapon to inflict +10 damage
Pact Of The Chain: Can forego one attack to allow familiar to attack as a reaction
Polearm Master: Can use a bonus action to attack with the butt of a polearm, inflicting 1d4 HP bludgeoning, and a foe entering polearm reach provokes an opportunity attack
Save Proficiency: Charisma; Wisdom
Save: Charisma: 8; Constitution: 2; Dexterity: 1; Intelligence: 4; Strength: 1; Wisdom: 7
Save Notes:
Elemental Gift: Has resistance to cold damage
Oceanic Soul: Has resistance to cold damage
Magic
Spell Slots: C0: 2; C1: 1; K0: 4; K5: 4 Attack: C: 7; K: 8 Spell DC: C: 15; K: 16
Spells:
Animate Dead (K3 [Undying Servitude] Necr): R10' Bones or the corpse of a Medium or Small creature becomes a skeleton or zombie that obeys commands when within 60' for 1 day [+Level animates +2 undead]
Chill Touch (K0 Necr): R120' Ranged spell inflicts 4d8 HP necrotic and target cannot regain hit points for 1 rd; undead also suffer disadvantage vs. self attack for 1 rd
Cone Of Cold (K5 [The Fathomless] Evoc): 60' cone inflicts 8d8 HP cold (save Constitution half) [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Detect Poison And Disease (C1 Divi): R30' Reveals poison, poisonous creatures, and diseases for concentration up to 10 min [R]
Eldritch Blast (K0 Evoc): R120' Ranged spell creates 4 rays that inflict 1d10 HP force each
Evard's Black Tentacles (K4 [Grasping Tentacles] Conj): R90' 20' sq inflicts 3d6 HP bludgeoning and restrains (save Dexterity negates, Strength or Dexterity breaks free) for concentration up to 1 min
Find Familiar (K1 [Pact Of The Chain] Conj): R10' Self gains the service of a summoned spirit in animal form that can deliver touch attacks when within 100' [R]
Friends (K0 Ench): Self gains advantage on Charisma checks with a non-hostile target for concentration up to 1 min; the target becomes hostile afterward
Hold Monster (K5 Ench): R90' Immobilizes the target creature (save Wisdom ends) for concentration up to 1 min [+Level affects +1 target]
Minor Illusion (K0 Illu): R30' Creates the sound of 1 creature or a 5' cube image (Investigation detects) for 1 min
Poison Spray (K0 Conj): R10' Inflicts 4d12 HP poison (save Constitution negates)
Sacred Flame (C0 Evoc): R60' Inflicts 4d8 HP radiant (save Dexterity negates)
Seeming (K5 [Djinni] Illu): R30' Changes the appearance of targets (save Charisma negates; Investigation detects) for 8 hr
Sending (K3 [Far Scribe] Evoc): Self can exchange 25-word messages with a familiar target
Thaumaturgy (C0 Tran): R30' Creates minor magic effects—a booming voice, modification of flames, harmless tremors, an illusory sound, movement of a door or window, or a change in eye appearance—for 1 min
Magic Notes:
Eldritch Invocations: 8 selections
Magic Initiate (Cleric): Knows 2 cleric cantrips and can cast a chosen C1 spell once per long rest
Bond Of The Talisman: Self or talisman wearer can teleport to the other 6 times per long rest
Eldritch Master: Can use a 1 min process to recover all expended spell slots once per long rest
Eldritch Mind: Has advantage on Constitution saves to maintain concentration
Eldritch Versatility: Can replace a cantrip, Pact Boon option, or Mystic Arcanum spell when boosting an ability or taking a feat
Far Scribe: Can cast Sending, targeting one of 6 creatures who have written their names in the Book Of Shadows, without using a spell slot or material components
Fathomless Plunge: R30' Can teleport self and 5 willing targets 1 mile to a known body of water once per short rest
Gift Of The Protectors: Creatures who have written their names in the Book Of Shadows retain 1 hit point when reduced to 0 hit points once per long rest
Grasping Tentacles: Can cast Evard's Black Tentacles with unbreakable concentration and gain 20 temporary hit points once per long rest
Guardian Coil: Can use a reaction to reduce damage taken within 10' of Tentacle Of The Deeps by 2d8 HP
Investment Of The Chain Master: Familiar gains a 40' fly or swim Speed, gains magical attacks, and inflicts DC 16 saves; self can use a bonus action to command it to attack and a reaction to give it resistance to damage
Limited Wish: Can gain the effects of a 6th level, 1-action spell once per 1d4 long rests
Mystic Arcanum: Can cast chosen K6, K7, K8, and K9 spells without using a spell slot once per long rest
Pact Magic: Can cast spells from the warlock spell list
Pact Of The Chain: Can cast Find Familiar as a ritual
Pact Of The Talisman: Talisman gives wearer +1d4 ability checks 6 times per long rest
Pact Of The Tome: Has a Book Of Shadows containing 3 chosen cantrips from any spell lists
Protection Of The Talisman: Talisman wearer can add +1d4 to a failed save 6 times per long rest
Rebuke Of The Talisman: R30' When the talisman wearer takes damage, self can use a reaction to inflict 6 HP psychic and a 10' push on the attacker
Sanctuary Vessel: R30' Can take 5 willing creatures into Genie's Vessel; 10 min within gives the benefits of a short rest, and spending Hit Dice restores +6 hit points
Tentacle Of The Deeps: R60' Can use a bonus action to summon a 10' tentacle that can move 30' and inflicts 2d8 HP cold and -10 Speed once per rd for 1 min 6 times per long rest
Undying Servitude: Can cast Animate Dead once per long rest
Notes
Validation Errors: Selectable Feature Allocation: 11 available vs. 17 allocated
